description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国金融人物，汉族。现任中国民生银行董事长，曾任中国银行副行长，为第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: A financial figure from the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity. He is the current chairman of China Minsheng Bank, a former vice president of Bank of China, and a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，高迎欣的籍贯地。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, and Gao Yingxin's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆第一家由民间资本设立的全国性商业银行。高迎欣自2020年起担任该行董事长。
description.en: The first national commercial bank in mainland China established by non-state-owned capital. Gao Yingxin has been its chairman since 2020.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十三届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会的成员集体。
description.en: The collective body of members of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所研究型大学，高迎欣的母校。
description.en: A research university located in Shanghai, China, and Gao Yingxin's alma mater.

zh-cn: 中银国际控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国银行旗下的投资银行。高迎欣曾于2004年至2005年担任其总裁兼首席运营官。
description.en: An investment bank under the Bank of China. Gao Yingxin served as its President and COO from 2004 to 2005.

zh-cn: 中银香港（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 香港上市的商业银行集团。高迎欣曾于2005年至2015年担任其副总裁、执行董事。
description.en: A commercial banking group listed in Hong Kong. Gao Yingxin served as its Vice President and Executive Director from 2005 to 2015.

nodes.id: 中国银行（香港）有限公司

zh-cn: 中国银行（香港）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 香港主要商业银行集团之一。高迎欣曾两度在该公司任职。
description.en: One of the major commercial banking groups in Hong Kong. Gao Yingxin held positions in the company twice.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国有商业银行之一。高迎欣曾于2015年至2018年担任该行副行长。
description.en: One of the state-owned commercial banks in China. Gao Yingxin served as its Vice President from 2015 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣的籍贯为河南省。
description.en: Gao Yingxin's ancestral home is Henan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1986年毕业于华东理工大学，获颁工学硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from East China University of Science and Technology in 1986 with a Master of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣于2004年7月至2005年2月期间，担任中银国际控股有限公司总裁兼首席运营官。
description.en: From July 2004 to February 2005, Gao Yingxin served as the President and Chief Operating Officer of BOC International Holdings Limited.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣于2005年2月至2015年2月期间，担任中银香港（控股）有限公司副总裁、执行董事。
description.en: From February 2005 to February 2015, Gao Yingxin served as the Vice President and Executive Director of BOC Hong Kong (Holdings) Limited.

relationships.target: 中国银行（香港）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣于2005年2月至2015年2月期间，担任中国银行（香港）有限公司副总裁、执行董事。
description.en: From February 2005 to February 2015, Gao Yingxin served as the Vice President and Executive Director of Bank of China (Hong Kong) Limited.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣于2015年2月至2018年1月期间，担任中国银行副行长。
description.en: From February 2015 to January 2018, Gao Yingxin served as the Vice President of Bank of China.

relationships.target: 中国银行（香港）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣于2018年1月至2020年5月期间，担任中国银行（香港）有限公司副董事长、总裁。
description.en: From January 2018 to May 2020, Gao Yingxin served as the Vice Chairman and President of Bank of China (Hong Kong) Limited.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣自2020年5月起任中国民生银行党委书记，同年7月任董事长。
description.en: Gao Yingxin was appointed Party Secretary of China Minsheng Bank in May 2020, and became Chairman in July of the same year.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣是第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: Gao Yingxin is a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 高迎欣是中国共产党党员，信息来源于维基百科分类。
description.en: Gao Yingxin is a member of the Communist Party of China, based on Wikipedia category information.
